item.title: From Powerpoint to Demos Easily With Desktops
item.author: hugoabernier.en
item.description: Introduction If you’ve ever tried to give a PowerPoint presentation and switch to your desktop to do a demo, you may have noticed that PowerPoint tends to fight with you to stay in slide show mode. Slide show mode shows your presentation in full screen, but it hides your cursor and captures your keyboard and mouse. If you want to get out of it to do your demo, you have to hit Esc, and Alt-Tab to your demo.
